summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2211, for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northwest from Market Street to West 65th Street; and West 56th Street from 14th Avenue Northwest to 17th Avenue Northwest; all in the City of Seattle, by re-surfacing, curbing and constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 22477 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
